mapper.select: SELECT * FROM doctor doc JOIN department dept ON doc.dept_id = dept.dept_id ORDER BY doc.doctor_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor (doctor_name, dept_id, license_no, phone, created_at) VALUES (#{doctorName}, #{deptId}, #{licenseNo}, #{phone}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE doctor SET doctor_name= #{doctorName}, dept_id= #{deptId}, phone= #{phone} WHERE doctor_id= #{doctorId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.consult_fee AS consultFee, d.insurance_rate AS insuranceRate FROM doctor a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE a.doctor_id = #{doctorId}
